name: Tech Assault
description:
What Is Tech Assault?

You play as the last line of defence within the virtual space and your job is to protect the module against all viruses that have infected the system. Eliminate the entities without getting detected as they can become deadly once spotted and complete the mission within the time limit before they take over the system.

Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D

Jump - Space

Shoot - LMB

Enter Ability Console - Enter

Pause Menu - ESC
